sentences.en: Although not ideal, this attitude is not entirely destructive.
sentences.cn: 这种态度虽然不够理想，但还不至于消极透顶。

sentences.en: Fabrics with a close weave are ideal for painting.
sentences.cn: 编织紧密的布最适合作画。

sentences.en: He has found his ideal mate.
I had the ideal man all worked out in my mind.
sentences.cn: 我已经想清楚了理想的人选。

sentences.en: It's ideal for people who like a sloppy movie.
sentences.cn: 对于喜欢伤感电影的人来说，这部影片再合适不过了。

sentences.en: The hotel is an ideal bolt-hole for Londoners.
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆是伦敦人理想的避风港。

sentences.en: The reality of mothering is frequently very different from the romantic ideal.
sentences.cn: 养育孩子的现实经常与浪漫的理想大相径庭。

sentences.en: The room's style exemplifies Conran's ideal of "beauty and practicality".
sentences.cn: 那个房间的风格是体现康兰“美观和实用”观念的典范。

sentences.en: The scheme offers an ideal opportunity for youngsters to get training.
sentences.cn: 该计划为年轻人提供了获得培训的极好机会。

sentences.en: The underground is ideal for getting to work in Milan.
sentences.cn: 在米兰，乘地铁去上班非常便捷。

sentences.en: Things aren't ideal, but that's the best you can hope for.
sentences.cn: 事情并不理想，但你只能指望这样了。

sentences.en: To everyone who knew them, they seemed an ideal couple.
sentences.cn: 在每个认识他们的人看来，他们似乎是天作之合。

sentences.en: Town gardens are ideal because they produce flowers nearly all year round.
sentences.cn: 城市公园是理想去处，那里几乎一年四季鲜花盛开。

sentences.en: Walt Disney stayed true to his ideals.
sentences.cn: 沃尔特·迪斯尼坚持他的理想。

sentences.en: Warm milk is the ideal breeding ground for bacteria.
sentences.cn: 温牛奶是细菌理想的滋生地。

sentences.en: We do not live in an ideal world.
sentences.cn: 我们并非生活在完美的世界里。

sentences.en: Weekend tours are ideal for families who want a short getaway.
sentences.cn: 周末旅行很适合那些想短期休假的家庭。

sentences.en: With so much rain, conditions are far from ideal.
sentences.cn: 雨水这么多，天气情况很不理想。
